input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
minecraft cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case Luxurious and Fashion Design

Product specifications:
Magnetic closure for increased protection
Durable full-frame protection from drops and dings
Vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern 
Special coating provides a smooth rubber grip
Keep your phone away from scratches, bumps and dust.
input_text.Response A: With this gorgeous White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case, you can protect your phone in true style. The luxurious and fashion design features a gorgeous 3D floral pattern for a vivid and realistic look. The case has a durable full-frame construction that provides reliable protection from bumps, dings and scratches, while the special coating offers a smooth rubber-like grip for added comfort. Plus, the magnetic closure ensures your phone is well protected at all times.
input_text.Response B: This is a cool phone case for the Minecraft fan! It has a 3D floral pattern and it comes in white for the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge. It has a special coating that provides a smooth rubber grip. It has a magnetic closure for increased protection. This case will keep your phone away from scratches, bumps, and dust!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
